title: Rugby World Cup 2019 fixtures and results: Quarter-final match times, plus every score so far
text:
The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams take on the quarter-finals this weekend.

Last week's final group stages saw two matches cancelled due to Typhoon Hagibis.

Here is the full list of remaining fixtures for the final eight countries competing, along with the results of the tournament from the early stages when 20 countries were competing.

Where is the tournament being held?

Japan. See the full list of stadiums hosting the games.

What are the latest standings?

Here's a basic run-down of how the tournament format works:

The opening group stage of the competition sees 20 teams attempt to battle their way out of four Pools - A, B, C and D. Each Pool contains five teams and only two can advance into the knockout rounds.

From there it is standard quarter-final, semi-final, final format.
description: The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams take on the quarter-finals this weekend.
